instructions.start: Deploying Jenkins with Blue Ocean UI for modern CI/CD experience.
instructions.end: Jenkins Blue Ocean has been deployed! Visit http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain to complete setup. Get initial admin password from logs.

description: Jenkins with Blue Ocean UI. Modern and intuitive interface for continuous integration and delivery pipelines.
